description: Tie and untie difficult knots.
Knowledge on raising and taking care of animals.
Knowledge on metal-working
Knowledge in the structure and composition of life.
Ability to pilot a boat.
Knowledge and ability on plants and how to grow/take care of them.
Knowledge in the structure, composition, and creation of various substances.
Allows you to build more sturdier and advanced structures.
The ability to build, maintain, or repair electrical systems.
The ability to build, maintain, or repair consumer electronics and devices.
Knowledge in the composition, creation, and usage of explosives.
Knowledge in a specific language. Every time you add a point to this skill, you may add a Language that your character knows.
Allows you to craft, repair, and improve upon firearms.
Allows you to hack or gain access to computer systems.
Allows you to attempt to hotwire a vehicle.
Allows you to attempt to pick standard locks.
Allows you to use tools to build, maintain, or repair machinery.
Knowledge in various medicines and the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease.
Generic knowledge of survival in the wilderness.
Ability to read a map, use a compass, and navigate without a GPS.
Ability to pilot a plane.
Ability to ride vehicles such as motorcycles or a horse.
Allows you to craft clothes.
